name: Renee Y. HACKNEY v. John O. WOODRING, Jr., Lipco, Inc., t/d/b/a Little People Day Care School. Appeal of John O. WOODRING, Jr.

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
PAPADAKOS, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
parties: Renee Y. HACKNEY v. John O. WOODRING, Jr., Lipco, Inc., t/d/b/a Little People Day Care School. Appeal of John O. WOODRING, Jr.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order of Superior Court reversed. See Kazatsky v. King David Memorial Park, Inc., 515 Pa. 183, 527 A.2d 988 (1987).
PAPADAKOS, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Audrey E. Woloshin, York, for J. Woodring.
Robert D. Glessner, York, for R.Y. Hackney.
casebody.head_matter:
652 A.2d 291
Renee Y. HACKNEY v. John O. WOODRING, Jr., Lipco, Inc., t/d/b/a Little People Day Care School. Appeal of John O. WOODRING, Jr.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Dec. 6, 1994.
Decided Dec. 30, 1994.
Audrey E. Woloshin, York, for J. Woodring.
Robert D. Glessner, York, for R.Y. Hackney.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
